name: Memory Lane (itch) (Oscar Berry)
description:
Memory Lane is my first year final project we made at BRASSART Lyon.

An artist seeking new ideas, loses himself in his introspection. He explores his mind as his own spiritual representation, in search of “fragments”, bribes of memories, experiences or inspirations.

The player travels through the artist’s different phases of ideation. He will have to travel dream lands and find enough fragments in order to forge a powerful idea.  To move from isle to isle, he will solve puzzles involving the camera.

The game has been created in 6 weeks, by a team of 9 students :

3D artists

  • Tristan POULENARD
  • Eliott LARGE
  • Clara MARTINS DA SILVA
  • Marilyse HOCHARD
  • Lilian CHOKOUALE DATOU

Game Designer & Programmer

  • Hugo PICOLO

 Game Designers & Level Designers

  • Lucas VERPILLAT
  • Yannick LE DUFF
  • Oscar BERRY
